#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=12345;
int boom[N]; // boom[i]=0 means i is prime.

vector<int> p; // prime no. storage.

void prepare() {
    p.push_back(2);
    for(int i=3;i*i<N;i+=2) {
        if(!boom[i]) {
            for(int j=i*i;j<N;j+=(2*i)) {
                boom[j]=1;
            }
        }
    }
    for(int i=3;i<N;i+=2) {
        if(!boom[i]) p.push_back(i);
    }
}

long long _pow(long long a, int n) {
    long long res=1;
    while(n) {
        if(n & 1) res=(res*a);
        a=(a*a);
        n>>=1;
    }
    return res;
}

int main() {
    prepare();
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        long long ans=1, n;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        if(n<=3) {
            puts("0");
        } else {
            long long nn=n;
            for(int i=0;p[i]*p[i]<=nn;i++) {
                int ctr=0;
                while(n%p[i]==0) {
                    ctr++;
                    n/=p[i];
                }
                long long prod=(_pow((long long)p[i], ctr+1)-1)/(p[i]-1);
                ans=(ans*prod);
            }
            if(n>1) {
                ans=(ans*(n+1));
            }
            ans=(ans-1-nn);
            printf("%lld\n", ans);
        }
    }
}
